reporting-org.narrative: Organisation des Nations unies pour l'éducation, la science et la culture (UNESCO)
United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO)

title.narrative: Development of Studies on Water Resources and Basic Sanitation Regulation and Institutional Organization of ADASA.

description.narrative: This project aims to conduct technical studies and the provision of essential means for strengthening policies for water and sanitation, in order to support the consolidation of the institutional matrix of the water management system and basic sanitation of the Distrito Federal. Furthermore, it also aims to support the technical and strategic structuring ADASA as well as the qualification and training of current technical agency and those to be incorporated by public tender, allowing of the Distrito Federal achieve excellence in management and regulation of the uses water resources, sanitation
